full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/18/2023 BANCO CAPITALIZADOR, S.A. CABLE "BANCAPI' TELEFONO: 23-3277 SAN SALVADOR, EL SALVADOR, C. A. 28 de Noviembre de 1973.- Sr. PEDRO JOSE PORTILLO 1519 South Manhattan Place Apt. 106 Los Angeles California. U.S.A. Por la presente comunicamos que en esta fecha re- cibimos su carta del 23 de Noviembre/ /73 con M.O. por - $450.00 para abonar a las cuentas 1941 y 2813, las cua les quedan con los siguientes saldos: Cta. No. 1941 de Pedro Jos√© Portillo, saldo $6.235.13 Cta. No. 2813 de Matilde A.de Portillo, saldo$ 683.40 Sin mas por el momento nos es grato suscribir-- nos de Usted. Atentos Servidores y amigos. Suc. Av. Independencia. FIRMA RESPONSABLE B Form. No. 46 Tip. Gutenberg 25b. 100h. 5-72 DO NOT DETACH THIS CARD Complete Fully and Carefully. This Card will Be Returned To You By Mail. I hereby request that any death benefit payable upon my death under any group insurance policy issued by any insurer to the Trustees of a health and welfare plan administered by Southwest Administrators, Inc., established pursuant to a collective bargaining agreement between any employer and any union local affiliated with the International Brotherhood of Teamsters be paid to the following Beneficiary: ARDON BENEFICIARY DESIGNATION Beneficiary MATILDE (Last Name) C.A. (First) (Initial) Address 127 PASAJE ECUADOR EL SALVADOR 3-14-1911 SPOUSE (Number) (Street) (City) (State) (Date of Birth) (Relationship) PLEASE PRINT OR TYPE YOUR OWN NAME AND ADDRESS PEP RO P HERNANDEZ (Name) 1519 SOUTH MANHATTAN PLACE 1 understand that this Beneficiary Designation cancels any prior Beneficiary Designation made by me for such death benefit. (Address) LOS ANFELES CALIFORNIA Date 2-1-13 (City) (State) Witnessed by Rea gill Signature Employees 02010
